Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MCF (melittin C-terminal fragment, UCLL1; Synthetic AMPs20)

Literature Information.Literature: 57.69% similar to its parent peptide Melittin (AP00146).Activity: Active against E. coli W 160-37 (MIC 35-45 ug/ml), S. aureus 8530B (MIC 25-35 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 15-25 ug/ml), and P.putida NCIM 2102 (MIC >200 ug/ml).Toxicity: HC50 reached 100 ug/ml comapred to the parent peptide (HC50 < 1 ug/ml).SAR: The peptide has reduced antibacterial activity and 300 fold less hemolytic.Caerin 2.5 has been merged with Caerin 2.2 since they share the same sequence. Updated 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Subbalakshmi C, Nagaraj R, Sitaram N. 1999
Literature Information.Title: Biological activities of C-terminal 15-residue synthetic fragment of melittin: design of an analog with improved antibacterial activity
